pages.title: Another Diend
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Zi-O NEXT TIME: Geiz, Majesty (2020, V-Cinema film)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:zi_o/devices/another_diend_belt)Another Diend Belt$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed IV$(li)Resistance III$(li)Haste III$(li)Jump Boost IV$(li)Strength IV
